import React from "react"; import data from "../data"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); if (!product) { return
Product Not Found
; } return (
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ):( Unavailable )}
); } export default ProductScreen;
